text: Michael "Max" Grodénchik (born November 12, 1952) is an American stage, movie and television actor, best known for his role as Rom, a recurring character on the television series Star Trek: Deep Space Nine. ==Other websites== * Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York City Category:American stage actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Max Grodénchik
